name: Flippety Floppity In Flop City
description:
There exists a city where the mad go to die.

Flop City.

View the perspective of a brave armed fish as he takes on the harsh conditions of Flop City, where he must learn how to fight in order to survive like everyone else thriving in the horrid city.

---------

Featuring :

- Just one ending.

- A very dumb battle system.

-pixel art???

- Fish

------

Credits :

Soundtrack done by

- Fancyguy (https://soundcloud.com/fancyguy-official)

- Fiore

And also includes royalty free music from Bensound
